subject: YouTube video collaboration
description_text:
Hi, my name is Alessandro, I have a youtube channel that talks about
driving simulators that has 18k subscribers. I am interested in your
products to make videos. You may be interested in one collaboration? The
channel name is "Malati di Simracing"


Best Regards
Alessandro Cappa
Malati di Simracing

conversations.body_text: Hi Alessandro,  Thank you very much for reaching out — we appreciate your interest in our products and your YouTube channel “Malati di Simracing.”  Before we can discuss a potential collaboration, could you please share the link to your channel? Our manager will review your content to determine the best way we might work together.  Looking forward to receiving the link!  Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Hello, thank you for replying so quickly.
Here is the link to the channel:

https://youtube.com/@malatidisimracing

Il mer 3 dic 2025, 12:07 service@simsonn.com
